abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Alternanthera philoxeroides (Mart.) Griseb." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Colección de plantas vasculares del herbario de la Universitat de València (VAL) 1 records from CeDoc de Biodiversitat Vegetal: BCN-Cormophyta 1 records from Jardín Botánico de Córdoba: Herbarium COA 1 records from Herbario de la Facultad de Farmacia de la Universidad Complutense de Madrid (MAF) 1 records from Herbário João de Carvalho e Vasconcellos, I.S.A./U.L. 1 records from Herbarium of Vascular Plants Collection of the University of Extremadura (Spain) 1 records from Herbario HSS Finca La Orden-Valdesequera (CICYTEX). Junta de Extremadura 1 records from ALA species sightings and OzAtlas 1 records from Plants of Papua New Guinea 1 records from Herbarium Berolinense, Berlin (B) 1 records from MAR - Herbário do Maranhão 1 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 1 records from NE AVH data 1 records from Moscow University Herbarium (MW) 1 records from MBML-Herbario - Herbário Mello Leitão 1 records from MPM Milwaukee Public Museum Herbarium 1 records from BOTU - Herbário Irina Delanova Gemtchújnicov 1 records from Herbario de la Universidad Pública de Navarra, Pamplona: UPNA-H 1 records from Herbarium Senckenbergianum (FR) 1 records from BRBA herbarium -
